1.0.0.name: pastel-tron-syntax

readme:
# Pastel Tron Syntax Theme

Based on [pastel-tron-theme.el](https://github.com/yupferris/dotfiles/blob/master/emacs/pastel-tron-theme/pastel-tron-theme.el)
which was based on [tomorrow-night-paradise-theme.el](https://github.com/jimeh/tomorrow-night-paradise-theme.el/blob/master/tomorrow-night-paradise-theme.el)
which was based on [Tomorrow Night Bright Theme](https://github.com/ChrisKempson/Tomorrow-Theme).
